## getErcs() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getErcs(
  contract: RequiredParam<ValidContractInstance | null>,
): {
  erc1155:
    | Erc1155<
        | import("@web3sdks/sdk/dist/declarations/src/evm/types/eips").BaseERC1155
        | import("@web3sdks/sdk/dist/declarations/src/evm/types/eips").BaseSignatureMintERC1155
      >
    | undefined;
  erc721:
    | Erc721<
        import("@web3sdks/sdk/dist/declarations/src/evm/types/eips").BaseERC721
      >
    | undefined;
  erc20:
    | Erc20<
        | import("@web3sdks/sdk/dist/declarations/src/evm/types/eips").BaseERC20
        | import("@web3sdks/sdk/dist/declarations/src/evm/types/eips").BaseSignatureMintERC20
      >
    | undefined;
};
```

| Parameter | Type                                                                               | Description |
